Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets and the Philadelphia Phillies meet Sunday in MLB playoffs action from Citizens Bank Park. This will be the second installment in a best-of-five postseason series.
Others: The game will be broadcast on FS1.
The starting pitchers for the game are Cristopher Sanchez for the Philadelphia Phillies and Luis Severino for the New York Mets.
Betting odds for the game have the Philadelphia Phillies as favorites with a moneyline of -155 and the New York Mets as underdogs with a moneyline of +142.
The over/under for the game is set at 7.5 runs.
